title: Glimmer of Light in Virus Testing, Cruise Industry Takes a Hit
itunes:title: Glimmer of Light in Virus Testing, Cruise Industry Takes a Hit
description:
Dr. Amy Compton-Phillips, Chief Clinical Officer at Providence St. Joseph Health, discusses efforts to contain the coronavirus outbreak. Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Justin Fox talks about the focus on those most-at-risk for the virus. James Hardiman, Leisure Analyst at Wedbush Securities, breaks down how COVID-19 concerns are hitting cruise stocks.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
